name: Squire
bio: Squire started this website to give the power back to the people. He enjoys watching people do things. Lives in New York.

name: Sambones
bio: Sam grew up in New York City and now based in DC. He's a teacher with a love for thrillers and mysteries—especially films that reward close attention and bold storytelling.

name: Alejandro Armstrong
bio: Jake Block is a native of Ballston Spa New York, founded by the Methodist Minister Ephraim Ball in 1872. Ball had 8 children, only 2 of whom—Onan and Lot—survived to adulthood. Ball died destitute in a whore house in 1901, riddled with clamidia.

name: Beau Welch
bio: Beau believes that a film is only as good as its story and narrative structure, screenwriting, directing, performances, cinematography, score, editing, production design, FX, emotional and intellectual impact, cultural and historical context, and overall cohesion.
